Articles.Content:
I love the EVA function, however when making KSP movies, I feel 1st person Eva would be so cool!

Yes, I know, there's a mod for that, but it is discontinued and needs to be implemented into the game!

Basically just press C in EVA view. Done!

What do you think?

It's still crazy to me that we don't have 1st person EVA yet. It can really provide a sense of scale you don't always get in 3rd person. It's also an inconstancy in the games "rules" that you can go 1st person while seated in a vessel, but no time else.

- - - Updated - - -

I also love the idea of an option to only play in 1st person, but that would also require Squad to implement RPM like functionality.

The Hullcam mod has first person EVA now and is up to date

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365-1-0-2-Hullcam-VDS-Wide-Angle-Camera-Female-Kerbal-EVA-view-Updated-8-May](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365-1-0-2-Hullcam-VDS-Wide-Angle-Camera-Female-Kerbal-EVA-view-Updated-8-May)
